name: Bully McGuire's Pizza Time
description:
Game made for the Low Effort Game Jam 18. Which the theme is Pizza.

Tutorial:

Complete the course before the time run out.

In case of tumbling you must tap alternately the keys **Arrow Left** and **Arrow Right**

Moving by arrows. "R" to retry when dead. And that's all, simple ain't it?

Credits:

Everything not so proudly made by me. Except the music by: migfus20 and nene, both took from OpenGameArt.

 Rock Band - Rock | OpenGameArt.org 

https://opengameart.org/content/short-theme-rockmetal
